tasks.title: Project Setup
tasks.description: Initialize the React Native project using Expo and set up the development environment.
tasks.details:
1. Initialize a new Expo project with TypeScript.
2. Set up the folder structure as per the PRD.
3. Configure Babel, tsconfig, and app.json.
4. Install core dependencies including navigation, storage, and axios.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the project runs successfully on both Android and iOS emulators.

subtasks.title: Initialize Expo Project with TypeScript
subtasks.description: Create a new Expo project using TypeScript template.
subtasks.details: Use the Expo CLI to initialize a new project with TypeScript support.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run the project to ensure it starts without errors.

subtasks.title: Set Up Folder Structure
subtasks.description: Organize the project folders according to the PRD specifications.
subtasks.details: Create directories for components, screens, assets, and utils as outlined in the PRD.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify the folder structure matches the PRD.

subtasks.title: Configure Babel and TypeScript
subtasks.description: Set up Babel and TypeScript configurations for the project.
subtasks.details: Edit babel.config.js and tsconfig.json to include necessary presets and paths.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure the project compiles without TypeScript or Babel errors.

subtasks.title: Configure app.json
subtasks.description: Set up app.json with project-specific settings.
subtasks.details: Update app.json with the app name, slug, and other configurations as required.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that the app.json settings are correctly applied by running the app.

subtasks.title: Install Core Dependencies
subtasks.description: Install essential libraries such as navigation, storage, and axios.
subtasks.details: Use npm or yarn to install React Navigation, AsyncStorage, and axios.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that all dependencies are installed and can be imported without errors.

tasks.title: Implement Authentication System
tasks.description: Develop the authentication system using JWT for Employer and Worker roles.
tasks.details:
1. Create AuthContext using React Context API.
2. Implement login and registration screens for Employer and Worker.
3. Use AsyncStorage to persist JWT tokens.
4. Set up axios interceptors for automatic token injection.
tasks.testStrategy: Test login and registration flows for both roles and ensure tokens are stored and retrieved correctly.

subtasks.title: Create AuthContext using React Context API
subtasks.description: Develop the AuthContext to manage authentication state using React Context API.
subtasks.details: Set up a new context for authentication, providing state and dispatch functions to manage login status and user roles.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure context provides correct state and updates on login/logout.

subtasks.title: Implement Login and Registration Screens
subtasks.description: Develop login and registration screens for both Employer and Worker roles.
subtasks.details: Create separate components for login and registration, ensuring form validation and error handling are implemented.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test form submission and validation for both roles.

subtasks.title: Persist JWT Tokens Using AsyncStorage
subtasks.description: Use AsyncStorage to store and retrieve JWT tokens securely.
subtasks.details: Implement functions to save and retrieve JWT tokens from AsyncStorage, ensuring secure storage practices.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify tokens are stored and retrieved correctly after login.

subtasks.title: Set Up Axios Interceptors for Token Injection
subtasks.description: Configure axios interceptors to automatically inject JWT tokens into requests.
subtasks.details: Modify axios instance to include interceptors that attach JWT tokens to outgoing requests, handling token refresh if needed.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that requests include tokens and handle token expiration gracefully.

subtasks.title: Test Authentication Flows
subtasks.description: Conduct comprehensive testing of login and registration flows for both roles.
subtasks.details: Perform end-to-end testing of authentication processes, ensuring all components work together seamlessly.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test login, registration, token storage, and API requests for both Employer and Worker roles.

tasks.title: Set Up Navigation Structure
tasks.description: Configure navigation using React Navigation for authentication and main app flows.
tasks.details:
1. Set up Stack Navigator for authentication and main app flows.
2. Implement Bottom Tab Navigator for main features.
3. Ensure role-based tab visibility for Employer and Worker.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify navigation flows between authentication and main app screens, ensuring correct tab visibility based on user role.

subtasks.title: Set Up Stack Navigator for Authentication
subtasks.description: Configure a Stack Navigator to manage authentication flows.
subtasks.details: Implement a Stack Navigator to handle login and registration screens for both Employer and Worker roles.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify navigation between login and registration screens.

subtasks.title: Set Up Stack Navigator for Main App Flows
subtasks.description: Configure a Stack Navigator for the main application screens.
subtasks.details: Implement a Stack Navigator to manage transitions between main app screens after authentication.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure smooth navigation between main app screens.

subtasks.title: Implement Bottom Tab Navigator for Main Features
subtasks.description: Create a Bottom Tab Navigator for the main features of the app.
subtasks.details: Set up a Bottom Tab Navigator to allow users to switch between main features like Dashboard, Jobs, and Profile.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test tab switching functionality and ensure correct screen rendering.

subtasks.title: Configure Role-Based Tab Visibility
subtasks.description: Ensure that tabs are visible based on user roles (Employer or Worker).
subtasks.details: Implement logic to show or hide tabs in the Bottom Tab Navigator based on the user's role.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that tabs are correctly shown or hidden for each user role.

subtasks.title: Integrate Navigation with Authentication Context
subtasks.description: Connect navigation structure with authentication context to manage user sessions.
subtasks.details: Use React Context API to integrate navigation with authentication state, ensuring users are directed to the correct screens based on their authentication status.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test navigation flows to ensure users are redirected appropriately based on authentication state.

tasks.title: Develop Core UI Components
tasks.description: Create reusable UI components matching the web app design.
tasks.details:
1. Develop Button, Input, and Card components with consistent styling.
2. Use design tokens for colors, spacing, and typography.
3. Ensure components visually match the web app.
tasks.testStrategy: Visually inspect components to ensure they match the web app design and test their functionality.

subtasks.title: Develop Button Component
subtasks.description: Create a reusable Button component with consistent styling.
subtasks.details: Implement the Button component using design tokens for colors, spacing, and typography. Ensure it matches the web app design.
subtasks.testStrategy: Visually inspect the Button component and test click functionality.

subtasks.title: Develop Input Component
subtasks.description: Create a reusable Input component with consistent styling.
subtasks.details: Implement the Input component using design tokens for colors, spacing, and typography. Ensure it matches the web app design.
subtasks.testStrategy: Visually inspect the Input component and test input functionality.

subtasks.title: Develop Card Component
subtasks.description: Create a reusable Card component with consistent styling.
subtasks.details: Implement the Card component using design tokens for colors, spacing, and typography. Ensure it matches the web app design.
subtasks.testStrategy: Visually inspect the Card component and test display functionality.

subtasks.title: Integrate Design Tokens
subtasks.description: Integrate design tokens for colors, spacing, and typography across components.
subtasks.details: Ensure all components use the same design tokens for consistent styling across the application.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that all components use the correct design tokens and maintain visual consistency.

subtasks.title: Visual Consistency Check
subtasks.description: Ensure all components visually match the web app design.
subtasks.details: Perform a final review to ensure all components are visually consistent with the web app design.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct a comprehensive visual inspection of all components against the design specifications.

tasks.title: Implement Jobs List and Detail Screens
tasks.description: Develop screens to display and interact with job listings.
tasks.details:
1. Create JobsListScreen using FlatList to display jobs.
2. Develop JobCard component with matching design.
3. Implement JobDetailScreen with full job information.
4. Integrate API calls to fetch job data.
tasks.testStrategy: Test job listing and detail views for correct data display and UI consistency.

subtasks.title: Create JobsListScreen with FlatList
subtasks.description: Develop the JobsListScreen using FlatList to display a list of job postings.
subtasks.details: Use React Native's FlatList component to render job items efficiently. Ensure the list is scrollable and supports pagination if necessary.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the list displays all job items correctly and supports scrolling.

subtasks.title: Develop JobCard Component
subtasks.description: Create a reusable JobCard component to display individual job details in the list.
subtasks.details: Design the JobCard to match the provided UI specifications. Include job title, company name, and a brief description.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that each JobCard displays the correct job information and matches the design specs.

subtasks.title: Implement JobDetailScreen
subtasks.description: Develop the JobDetailScreen to show full job information when a job is selected.
subtasks.details: Create a detailed view for each job, including all relevant information such as job description, requirements, and application details.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure that selecting a job from the list navigates to the detail screen and displays all job information accurately.

subtasks.title: Integrate API Calls for Job Data
subtasks.description: Set up API calls to fetch job data for the list and detail screens.
subtasks.details: Use a suitable library like axios to fetch job data from the backend. Implement error handling and loading states.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API integration to ensure data is fetched and displayed correctly, handling errors gracefully.

subtasks.title: Test Job Listing and Detail Views
subtasks.description: Conduct comprehensive testing of the job listing and detail views for data accuracy and UI consistency.
subtasks.details: Perform both manual and automated testing to verify that job data is displayed correctly and the UI is consistent with the design.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use test cases to validate data accuracy and UI consistency across different devices and screen sizes.

tasks.title: Implement Job Creation Feature
tasks.description: Enable Employers to create job postings with full details.
tasks.details:
1. Develop CreateJobScreen with form inputs for job details.
2. Integrate image picker for job images.
3. Use FormData for API uploads.
4. Implement form validation and error handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test job creation flow, including image uploads and form validation.

subtasks.title: Develop CreateJobScreen UI
subtasks.description: Design and implement the CreateJobScreen with form inputs for job details.
subtasks.details: Use React Native components to create a form with fields for job title, description, salary, and location.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify UI elements are correctly displayed and functional.

subtasks.title: Integrate Image Picker
subtasks.description: Add functionality to allow employers to upload images for job postings.
subtasks.details: Use a library like React Native Image Picker to enable image selection and preview within the form.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test image selection and ensure images are displayed correctly in the form.

subtasks.title: Implement FormData for API Uploads
subtasks.description: Set up FormData to handle job posting data and images for API submission.
subtasks.details: Configure FormData to include all form fields and selected images, and ensure correct API endpoint is used.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API calls to ensure data and images are uploaded successfully.

subtasks.title: Implement Form Validation and Error Handling
subtasks.description: Add validation rules and error handling for job posting form inputs.
subtasks.details: Use libraries like Yup and Formik to validate inputs and display error messages for invalid entries.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test form submission with valid and invalid data to ensure proper validation and error messages.

subtasks.title: Test Job Creation Flow
subtasks.description: Conduct end-to-end testing of the job creation process, including image uploads and form validation.
subtasks.details: Perform comprehensive testing to ensure all components work together seamlessly and meet requirements.
subtasks.testStrategy: Execute test cases covering all aspects of job creation, including edge cases and error scenarios.

tasks.title: Develop Applications Feature
tasks.description: Allow Workers to apply for jobs and Employers to manage applications.
tasks.details:
1. Create ApplicationsScreen to view job applications.
2. Develop ApplicationCard component.
3. Implement apply to job functionality for Workers.
4. Allow Employers to accept or reject applications.
tasks.testStrategy: Test application submission and management flows for both Workers and Employers.

subtasks.title: Create ApplicationsScreen Component
subtasks.description: Develop the ApplicationsScreen to display job applications for both Workers and Employers.
subtasks.details: Use React Native to create a screen that lists all job applications. Ensure it integrates with the backend to fetch application data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test if the screen displays applications correctly for both roles.

subtasks.title: Develop ApplicationCard Component
subtasks.description: Build a reusable ApplicationCard component to display individual job application details.
subtasks.details: Design the ApplicationCard to include job title, applicant name, and status. Ensure it is reusable across different screens.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify the component displays all necessary details and is reusable.

subtasks.title: Implement Apply to Job Functionality
subtasks.description: Enable Workers to apply for jobs through the application interface.
subtasks.details: Create a form that allows Workers to submit applications. Integrate with the backend to handle submissions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the application submission process to ensure data is sent and stored correctly.

subtasks.title: Develop Application Management for Employers
subtasks.description: Allow Employers to accept or reject job applications.
subtasks.details: Add functionality for Employers to change the status of applications. Update the backend to reflect these changes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the acceptance and rejection process to ensure status updates are saved.

subtasks.title: Integrate Application Features with Backend
subtasks.description: Ensure all application features are connected to the backend services.
subtasks.details: Use API endpoints to fetch, submit, and update application data. Ensure secure data handling.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test end-to-end application flows for both Workers and Employers.

tasks.title: Develop Profile Screen
tasks.description: Create a screen for users to view and update their profiles.
tasks.details:
1. Develop ProfileScreen to display user information.
2. Implement functionality to update profile details.
3. Add logout functionality.
tasks.testStrategy: Test profile view and update functionality, ensuring data is correctly saved and displayed.

subtasks.title: Design Profile Screen Layout
subtasks.description: Create the UI layout for the Profile Screen.
subtasks.details: Use existing UI components to design the layout for displaying user information.
subtasks.testStrategy: Visually inspect the layout to ensure it matches design specifications.

subtasks.title: Implement User Information Display
subtasks.description: Develop functionality to display user information on the Profile Screen.
subtasks.details: Fetch user data from the server and display it using the designed layout.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that user information is correctly fetched and displayed.

subtasks.title: Develop Profile Update Functionality
subtasks.description: Implement the ability for users to update their profile details.
subtasks.details: Create forms and logic to update user details and send updates to the server.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the update process to ensure changes are saved and reflected.

subtasks.title: Add Logout Functionality
subtasks.description: Implement a logout feature on the Profile Screen.
subtasks.details: Provide a button to log out, clearing user data and redirecting to the login screen.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure the logout process clears data and redirects correctly.

subtasks.title: Integrate Profile Screen with Navigation
subtasks.description: Connect the Profile Screen to the app's navigation system.
subtasks.details: Ensure the Profile Screen is accessible from the main navigation and returns correctly.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test navigation to and from the Profile Screen to ensure smooth transitions.

tasks.title: Implement Chat/Messaging Feature
tasks.description: Enable real-time messaging between Employers and Workers.
tasks.details:
1. Develop ChatListScreen to display conversations.
2. Implement ChatScreen for message exchange.
3. Set up real-time updates using polling or WebSocket.
4. Track unread message counts.
tasks.testStrategy: Test messaging functionality for real-time updates and correct unread message tracking.

subtasks.title: Develop ChatListScreen
subtasks.description: Create a screen to display a list of conversations between users.
subtasks.details: Use React Native to design and implement the ChatListScreen. Ensure it fetches and displays conversation previews.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the screen displays all conversations correctly.

subtasks.title: Implement ChatScreen for Message Exchange
subtasks.description: Develop a screen for users to send and receive messages in real-time.
subtasks.details: Design the ChatScreen using React Native. Implement message input and display areas.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test sending and receiving messages between users.

subtasks.title: Set Up Real-Time Updates
subtasks.description: Enable real-time messaging using WebSocket or polling.
subtasks.details: Integrate WebSocket for real-time updates or implement polling as a fallback.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure messages appear in real-time without manual refresh.

subtasks.title: Track Unread Message Counts
subtasks.description: Implement a system to track and display unread message counts for users.
subtasks.details: Store unread message counts in the database and update them as messages are read.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that unread counts update correctly when messages are read.

subtasks.title: Integrate Messaging with Backend
subtasks.description: Connect the chat feature with the backend to handle data storage and retrieval.
subtasks.details: Ensure the frontend communicates with the backend API for sending and receiving messages.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the integration by sending messages and checking database updates.

tasks.title: Implement Notifications
tasks.description: Set up push notifications for job updates, messages, and applications.
tasks.details:
1. Integrate Expo Notifications or Firebase Cloud Messaging.
2. Implement notification handling for job updates and messages.
3. Manage notification badges and alerts.
tasks.testStrategy: Test push notifications for different events and ensure they are received and displayed correctly.

subtasks.title: Integrate Notification Service
subtasks.description: Integrate Expo Notifications or Firebase Cloud Messaging into the app.
subtasks.details: Choose between Expo Notifications or Firebase Cloud Messaging and integrate it into the app to handle push notifications.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify integration by sending test notifications.

subtasks.title: Implement Job Update Notifications
subtasks.description: Set up push notifications for job updates.
subtasks.details: Develop functionality to send and receive notifications for job updates, ensuring users are alerted to changes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test by updating a job and checking if notifications are received.

subtasks.title: Implement Message Notifications
subtasks.description: Set up push notifications for new messages.
subtasks.details: Create a system to notify users of new messages in real-time, using the integrated notification service.
subtasks.testStrategy: Send a message and verify the notification is received.

subtasks.title: Manage Notification Badges
subtasks.description: Implement badge management for notifications.
subtasks.details: Develop logic to update app icon badges based on unread notifications and messages.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test badge updates by sending multiple notifications and checking badge counts.

subtasks.title: Handle Notification Alerts
subtasks.description: Implement in-app alerts for notifications.
subtasks.details: Create in-app alerts to display notifications when the app is open, ensuring users are aware of new updates.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test in-app alerts by triggering notifications while the app is open.
